RumorFact.Text: Ore mined on Timber Hearth was delivered to a forge on Hollow's Lantern, where its durability was improved using a Lava Diving Bell.
The Nomai on Timber Hearth were curious why more ore was requested by the Volcanic Testing Site.

ExploreFact.Text: Concerns were raised about the Ash Twin Project's memory statues' lack of insulation from the supernova.
The Ash Twin Project remains paired with individuals even if their memory statues are destroyed. However, the individual will be unable to recall any memories following the statue's destruction.
Memory statues will not be destroyed simultaneously, but only as each planet is engulfed by the supernova.
A final delivery of ore from Timber Hearth was requested for the construction of the Quantum Weather Lab.
